transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji madam, kaise hai aap?
Customer: Theek hai madam. Madam ye jo apna profile hai aap mera dekh rahe ho. Ye ye manage kaun karta hai?
Executive: Main handle kar rahi hu bataiye na mere paas hai. Aap handle kar rahe ho ye mera IndiaMART ka profile.
Customer: Haan bilkul do din pehle bhi to baat hua tha aapse na catalog ke regarding. Kya naam hai aapka?
Executive: Smrita.
Customer: Sorry?
Executive: Smrita, S M R I T A. Haan ji Smrita. Aapne bola tha na mail ID ke liye to humne bola bhi tha ki madam ye mail ID to nahi hai aapne wo message bhi kiya tha. Yaad hai?
Customer: Okay. To mail ID se kya hua madam change nahi hoga?
Executive: Actually kya hai na ki jo mail ID aap de rahi hai na A to Z wali wo mail ID bounce ho rahi hai yani ki usme space nahi hai. To wo update karna mushkil hai uski jagah pe koi aur mail ID hai to bataiye.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: And ye bol rahi thi main aapse ki ye jo apna ab main aap mera jo browser hai iska profile ka. Haan haan. To ye thoda sa isme thoda achcha tarike se kar dijiye na product ka.
Customer: Browser matlab kaunsa main samajh nahi pa rahi hu kaisa browser ka baat kar rahe hai.
Customer: Dekhiye aapne ye jo product hai. Haan haan, theek hai. Haan uska uski baat kar rahi hu. Achcha product. Aapne bola tha product. Haan haan catalog. Haan theek hai ek kaam kijiye online aa sakte hai. Laptop pe desktop pe?
Customer: Haan madam bolo. Okay. Ek kaam kijiye maine dekhiye video meet with IndiaMART team aise karke meeting link bheja hai. Laptop hai desktop hai aapka?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Wait madam.
Executive: Kya madam aap kya bol rahi hai boliye fir hum keh rahe hai ki aapke paas desktop hai ya laptop hai kya hai?
Customer: Haan to madam ye video meet ke liye keh rahe hai aap. Haan haan bilkul bilkul taki main screen share karke aap jo jo bolenge na wo wo karte chale jayenge na thoda clarity milega ki karna kya hai. Samajh rahe hai to isliye main bol rahi hu.
Customer: Ek minute. Message nahi aaya madam video meet ka. Mail aaya hoga ye jo mail ID hai na hamare paas register hai. Nahi aaya madam. Donikhan562002@gmail.com isse aaya hoga dekhiye. Achcha madam ye mujhe zara 4:30 baje ke time pe call kijiye na tab main attend karungi.
Executive: 4:30 baje karu? Ji. Video call ke liye theek hai. Waise mujhe ek cheez kuch cheeze ye confirm kar dijiye jaise aapka ye jo catalog hai. Theek hai A to Z enterprises to isme jo products available hai jaise ki chain pulley block hai MS plate hai safety helmets wagera hai to isme photo add karne ki aap baat kar rahe hai catalog mein?
Customer: Photo wagera kuch rahega to main aapko bata rahi hu isme hai na ab un thoda sa achche se uske upar discussion kar lenge. Aap mujhe link bheji ha link aaya hai mere paas video meet ka. Abhi aaya. Haan. To theek hai aap mujhe 4:30 baje ke time pe call kijiye aap tab main. 4:30 baje aap usko join karenge theek hai. To catalog mein dekhiye main kuch cheeze aur ek cheez bata deti hu aap join 4:30 baje karega koi dikkat nahi hai usko detail mein discuss kar lenge. Jaise aapke catalog mein jo bhi products available hai na jaise safety helmets wagera ho gaya safety gloves ho gaya theek hai fir uske baad aapka jo hai jackets wagera hai shoes wagera hai theek hai aur MS pulley chain block wagera hai to dono mein hi kaam hai aapka dono product line mein?
Customer: Safety product aur fire extinguisher aur jitne bhi hai product hai theek hai jo bhi rahega aage list mein aapko batayenge. Haan sorry?
Executive: Aap mujhe 4:00 baje ke time pe call kijiye madam ko aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan haan aawaz aa rahi hai boliye. Okay. Theek hai aap mujhe 4:30 baje ke time pe call kijiye apne product list get baat karte hai uske upar hai na catalog wagera. Theek hai. Chaliye theek hai okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to improve product catalog appearance.

- Customer's email ID bouncing, needs update.

- Customer did not receive the video meet link.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to guide via video meet.

- Executive confirmed products for catalog update.

- Executive agreed to call back at 4:30 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 4:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, email, video meet, products
